examples: My office is on the fifth floor.
It's the fifth time that I've been to America.
Her mother had just given birth to another child, her fifth.
He finished fifth in the race.

meanings.def: each of five equal parts of something
examples: She cut the cake into fifths.
He gave her a fifth of the total amount.

meanings.def: to make use of the right to refuse to answer questions in court about a crime, because you may give information which will make it seem that you are guilty

idioms.def: to make use of the right to refuse to answer questions in court about a crime, because you may give information which will make it seem that you are guilty
